name: telegram-receiver
description: Telegram webhook receiver that forwards messages to Cursor Runner API

scripts.test: [ -f node_modules/.bin/jest ] && jest || echo 'Jest not installed, skipping tests'
scripts.test:coverage: [ -f node_modules/.bin/jest ] && jest --coverage || echo 'Jest not installed, skipping coverage'
scripts.lint: [ -f node_modules/.bin/eslint ] && eslint src tests --ext .ts || echo 'ESLint not installed, skipping lint'
scripts.format:check: [ -f node_modules/.bin/prettier ] && prettier --check "src/**/*.ts" "tests/**/*.ts" || echo 'Prettier not installed, skipping format check'
